author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL CONTINUES MOVING QUICKLY WEST-NORTHWESTWARD ACROSS THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN SEA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY...
summary:
...BERYL CONTINUES MOVING QUICKLY WEST-NORTHWESTWARD ACROSS THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN SEA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY...
 As of 11:00 AM AST Tue Jul 2
 the center of Beryl was located near 15.3, -68.9
 with movement WNW at 22 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 938 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 160 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
